vulnerabilities.title: DuckDB NPM packages 1.3.3 and 1.29.2 briefly compromised with malware
vulnerabilities.description:
The DuckDB distribution for [Node.js](http://node.js/) on [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) was compromised with malware (along with [several other packages](https://www.aikido.dev/blog/npm-debug-and-chalk-packages-compromised)). An attacker published new versions of four of duckdbâ€™s packages that included **malicious code to interfere with cryptocoin transactions**. The following packages and versions are affected:

- `@duckdb/node-api@1.3.3`
- `@duckdb/node-bindings@1.3.3`
- `duckdb@1.3.3`
- `@duc
